title: Event Venue 3D Visualization
description: Create detailed 3D visualizations and floor plans for multiple event venues to help clients visualize their event setup. Include furniture placement, lighting design, and crowd flow analysis.

milestones.title: Initial Venue Measurements & Planning
milestones.description: Site visit, measurements, and initial 3D model creation for primary venue spaces.

milestones.title: Detailed 3D Modeling & Rendering
milestones.description: Complete 3D models with furniture, lighting, and decor elements. Multiple angle renderings.

milestones.title: Interactive Walkthrough & Final Delivery
milestones.description: Create interactive 3D walkthrough and deliver all final files with documentation.

notes: Must have portfolio showing previous venue or architectural visualization work. Client meetings required during planning phase.
